document_data.name: Gaerd
document_data.mainbody: '''Gaerd''' was a magic instructor in the mid-late 8{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was [[Alustriel]]'s second teacher.
document_data.Possessions: He had some manner of ''[[crystal ball]]''.
document_data.Relationships: He became [[Alustriel]]'s instructor by {{yearlink|778}}. She believed him to be a [[Harper]]. Her uncle [[Thamator]] believed him to be a master of magic.
document_data.History: In [[Uktar 12]] of {{yearlink|778}},{{cite book/Elminster in Hell/Hardcover 2001|2|Realmslore}} Gaerd was scrying on [[Alustriel]] while she fought off [[Irlar]], finally killing him; she went to him afterwards, to ask him how to join the harpers.{{cite book/Elminster in Hell/Hardcover 2001|184-185|12}} A tenday before, he had taught her a spell akin to ''[[shocking grasp]]'' and recommended she keep her knowledge of it secret.
